title: Reuse Lucene.FieldType instances
description:
When lucene created FieldType (not to be confused with Solr's FieldType), Solr was ported by simply creating a new lucene.FieldType instance for every field indexed (see solr.FieldType.createField())

To avoid creating every time, Solr's SchemaField (which is already analagous to lucene.FieldType) can simply implement that interface.
